item.title: Escape the Backrooms coming to PS5, Xbox Series in 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

PC version launched today.

Publisher Secret Mode and developer Fancy Games will release cooperative horror adventure game Escape the Backrooms for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series in 2026, the companies announced. The console versions are co-developed by Blackbird Interactive.

Escape the Backrooms first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on August 11, 2022, followed by a full release today.

Here is an overview of the game, via Secret Mode:

About

Explore the seemingly infinite expanse of eerily familiar levels in the backrooms based on the popular creepypasta lore. Each level features different ways to escape with danger along the way.

Key Features

  • Immersive Experience – Realistic graphics, minimal user interfaces, and dreary ambience will ensure an immersive experience.
  • Cooperative Multiplayer – Explore the backrooms with a team of up to 4 players. Be warned, as teammates may no-clip into other areas of the map and every member of your team must find the exit alive to escape. No wanderer left behind.
  • Unique Levels – Traverse though 20+ unique levels based on backrooms lore with regular content updates adding more. Each level features a different way to escape with various danger along the way.
  • Dangerous Entities – Check every corner so you won’t be caught off guard by one of 12 hostile entities in the backrooms, each with their own mechanics you’ll need to quickly learn if you want to survive.
  • Proximity Voice Chat – Communicate with your teammates with proximity voice chat. Be sure to not wander far away from your team, as you can easily get lost in the confusing expanse of the backrooms. Entities can also hear you, so stay quiet whenever you’re near any danger.

Watch a new trailer below.

Launch and Consoles Announce Trailer

item.title: Egging On adds PS5, Xbox Series versions
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Physics-based platformer gets additional launch day platforms.

Physics-based platformer Egging On will launch for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series alongside its previously announced PC (Steam) version, publishers Alibi Games and IndieArk, and developer Egobounds announced. The PC version will also be available via Microsoft Store. A release date has yet to be announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Cascade into insanity on your perilous journey into the sky. Armed with nothing but a fragile shell and a slimy yolk, can you take a lone egg to new heights?

This game is hard-boiled. Face the challenge of being a real, fragile egg. Escape the hen-house and jump, roll and climb your way through a farm shop, factory and other perilous environments. With some determination, you might just reach your freedom.

Key Features

  • It’s No Yolk – You’re an egg—and you’ll feel every wobble, roll, and crack. Master the art of egg physics as you navigate challenging climbing environments with a twist. Synchronize your jump with your roll-cycle, and when you’re at the tip, leap for maximum height! Miss a jump, and you could be back at the bottom, dripping yolk.
  • An Egg-centric Adventure – Explore a variety of egg themed environments and carefully crafted levels. Each area is packed with interactive elements, delivering fresh challenges and unique atmospheres—think chainsaws and angry roosters! Bear in mind, not everything wants you to reach the top…
  • Egg-spress Yourself – Why settle for plain? Unlock decorative shells and roll through the world in style. Every jump might reveal a hidden secret, and gathering stamps on your journey to the top will earn you rewards—just don’t fall and lose it all! Customize your egg, flaunt your flair, and become the fanciest egg on the farm!

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series Announce Trailer

item.title: Shapeshifting action adventure game Edenfall: Legacy of the First Wardens for PC launches in 2026
item.content:encoded:
Edenfall: Legacy of the First Wardens, an action adventure game where players can shapeshift into a wolf, raccoon, and raven, will launch for PC via Steam and Epic Games Store in 2026, developer Everflux Games announced. A demo is available now.

Here is an overview of the game, via Everflux Games:

About

A breathtaking metamorphosis awaits as you guide Venya through a world overcome by darkness. Use her shapeshifting powers to restore peace to a land that has gone without, for far too long.

Unveil a mystical action adventure where you shift between human, wolf, raccoon, and raven. Weave fluid combos across forms, purge corruption, and awaken the land’s lost beauty. Together with your spirit fox companion, embark on a soulbound journey of transformation, memory, and inner peace.

Key Features

  • Morph and Traverse – Switch seamlessly from human to wolf, raccoon, and raven. Each form offers unique traversal and combat mechanics. Glide like a raven through misty canopies, pounce like a wolf across beautiful landscapes, change into a raccoon to slip through tight ruins, and strike like a human with precision. Every form reveals new paths, puzzles, and secrets tucked across Eden.
  • Fluid Form-Blending Battles – Master an intricate combo system that blends attacks from different forms. Chain a raccoon’s nimble strikes into a wolf’s feral fury, then follow up with a human’s finishing blow. Master the flow of combat and help restore peace to the world.
  • From Blight to Bloom – Defeat enemies and conquer each boss to witness a corrupted area return to its natural beauty. Every victory restores a piece of Eden and reinforces the bond between inner peace and external hope.

Watch a new trailer below.

Demo Trailer

item.title: Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake details beginning of each adventure
item.content:encoded:
Get the details below.

■ Launching Soon! Experience a Story Brought Together by the Descendants of Erdrick!

Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake will launch simultaneously worldwide on Thursday, October 30, 2025, across multiple platforms. This title is a full remake that combines Dragon Quest I and Dragon Quest II—which depict the world after Dragon Quest III—into one game. Not only does it feature a new scenario, but it has also evolved in various ways, including new areas, new dungeons, new encounters and new formidable foes. Additionally, gameplay elements like sigils and scrolls have been added, while battles have been significantly enhanced! Witness the conclusion of the Erdrick Trilogy depicted in HD-2D with your own eyes!

—Enjoy an even deeper story in Dragon Quest I, featuring encounters with various races and new formidable foes appearing across the land!

—In Dragon Quest II, a new stage for adventure appears: the ocean floor! Explore the unknown undersea world!

—In Dragon Quest II, the Princess of Cannock joins your party! Numerous episodes delving deeper into the protagonists’ emotions have also been added!

—In Dragon Quest I and Dragon Quest II, use scrolls to learn new skills and spells, and harness the power of sigils to defeat the advancing enemies!

■ Introducing Dragon Quest I

Introducing the Beginning of the Adventure! Explore the Lands of Alefgard, Guided by a Mysterious Voice!

Led by a mysterious voice heard in a dream, the protagonist (you) arrives at Tantegel Castle. The king advises you to investigate the legendary hero, Erdrick, and the guiding voice, sending you toward Erdrick’s Hollow and the Shrine of Rain. Listen to the stories of people you meet along the way as you explore the lands of Alefgard where the legend of Erdrick remains!

—Make preparations before setting out on your adventure!

Receive useful items and gold coins from the king of Tantegel. Use the money to buy items and equipment. Remember, you must equip items to use them!

—Depart Tantegel and head for Erdrick’s Hollow!

Use the shortcut button to register your favorite commands as shortcut keys. It’s super handy for instantly using recovery items you find in sparkling spots on the field!

—Battle monsters in the overworld and dungeons!

In this game, you can check monsters’ statuses when selecting commands. Choose your attacks while keeping an eye on your opponents!

—Dungeons and caves are packed with treasure!

Dungeon exploration is dangerous, but treasures like scrolls and mini medals lie hidden within. Deliver your collected mini medals to the person gathering them and you’ll receive luxurious items in return.

—Talk to the people you meet on your journey!

During your adventure, you discover a place resembling a dilapidated ruin! A bard named Zalen seems to be researching Erdrick, but…

—What does the sage speak of at the Shrine of Rain…?

An old man calling himself a sage awaits at the long-sought Shrine of Rain! Does he know something about Erdrick or the guiding voice?

What truth emerges after journeying across the land…!? The great adventure of the descendants of Erdrick begins!

■ Introducing Dragon Quest II

Introducing the Beginning of the Adventure! Stand Against the Encroaching Evil Threat and Set Out on an Adventure With Companions Who Are the Descendants of Erdrick!

—Speak with the King of Midenhall and begin your adventure!

Before setting off, receive words of encouragement and a necklace called the Princess’s Pledge from your father, the king. This necklace is said to hold special power, so it will surely aid you on your adventure.

—Explore every corner of the overworld!

In this game, you can now choose in the settings whether to display the locations of hidden zones (secret spots) on the field, as well as the positions of treasure chests in towns and dungeons on the map.

—Take a breather in a town along the way!

When buying or selling items at shops, you have a chance to obtain “tombola tickets.” Once you’ve collected some, try your luck at the “tombola stalls” scattered around the world!

—Upon arriving at Cannock Castle…

You’ve reached Cannock Castle, but the Prince of Cannock is missing!? Set out to find him with his sister, the Princess of Cannock!

—Embark on an adventure with the Princess of Cannock!

While searching for the Prince, the Princess of Cannock joins you in battle! You can’t give her action commands at this point, but she’ll help the protagonist with various attacks and healing spells.

—Where could the Prince of Cannock be…?

Despite searching everywhere based on clues, the prince remains nowhere to be found… Let’s try revisiting places you’ve already been.

Will they safely reunite with the Prince of Cannock…!? The protagonists’ adventure continues!!

Gather the Living Memories Scattered Across the Ocean Floor to Uncover Alefgard’s Unknown History and New Truths!

As you progress through Dragon Quest II, the faeries will ask you for a favor. Collect the living memories scattered across the ocean floor to unravel the history of Alefgard.

—The Record-Keeper, who manages the faeries’ memories, asks you to gather the living memories inscribed with Alefgard’s history.

—It seems Hargon’s minions scattered these living memories across the ocean floor. Talk to those familiar with the sea, like the merfolk, and search the ocean floor thoroughly!

—While exploring the ocean floor and seabed, you can discover sparkling living memories! Be warned, however, the seabed is also home to terrifying monsters, so proceed with caution.

—The living memories seem to contain records of events that occurred in this world and details about the hero who was the ancestor of the protagonists.

item.title: DEFECT gameplay reveal trailers, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC

First in-game look at the cyberpunk first-person shooter.

emptyvessel has released a pair of gameplay reveal trailers and new screenshots for cyberpunk first-person shooter DEFECT.

“Our entire emptyvessel team is incredibly excited to show off this first look at gameplay in DEFECT as we’ve poured a ton of passion and time into crafting the game’s tone, atmosphere, and underlying systems,” said emptyvessel founder and game director Emanuel Palalic in a press release. “DEFECT is a HUD-less immersive shooter where any wall can be destroyed, gadgets and tools completely redefine how you approach combat, and every weapon or ammo type affects the world, interactables, and enemies in unique ways. The world is filled with emergent moments and dynamic branching narratives that react to player actions in real time.”

Get the latest details below.

The DEFECT gameplay trailer kicked off [Galaxies Autumn 2025] and to further delight the audience, emptyvessel surprised fans with a second gameplay trailer post-show. The extended five-minute cut was introduced by studio founder Emanuel Palalic, and offered more gameplay by showing off a squad of THE SYSTEM’S heavily armed police forces storming the grimy halls of a massive apartment complex to terminate a rogue artificial intelligence. They’re quickly given a warm welcome by the ruthless gang lording over the complex, drawing each faction into an explosive firefight that tears the environment to shreds. A quick-thinking officer is able to hijack the consciousness of an unfortunate gang member which allows him to revive a downed teammate by placing them into the mind of this gang member thereby making them part of the friendly team until the end of the match. The squad of police descend further into the guts of the building in order to reboot the entire block, taking their final stand while soaking in the neon lights and lasers of an underground dancefloor. The two-minute short-form version of the gameplay trailer condenses the action down to the highlights in all their destructive glory.

Initially announced in 2024, DEFECT is a new squad-based cyberpunk shooter, from the creative minds of emptyvessel. DEFECT delivers a new kind of experience through its immersive and highly tactical combat for fans of the action shooter genre. The game is set in a futuristic, divided city ruled by an enigmatic AI known as “THE SYSTEM” all while ruthless gangs and rogue law enforcement vie for supremacy. DEFECT is being created by industry-leading developers behind iconic franchises including DOOM, Call of Duty, and The Last of Us; and features music from legendary composer Mick Gordon.

  • ❮
  • ❯

The world of DEFECT is like none other and dominated by one rule: Chaos Above All. Players will revel in the anarchy of a city on the brink. Set in the last city of mankind, where THE SYSTEM, an authoritarian AI, rules with inhuman logic. Choose from a collection of dangerous factions—THE SYSTEM’S own policing force, Rogue Police Elements, or a host of gangs vying for power. Players will compete to achieve objectives like smuggling guns, assassinating targets, or arresting suspects. Suit up with state-of-the-art weaponry and technology to give yourself the edge you need to live another day.

Every mission is different, whether you’re acting as the law, the lawless, or those caught in between. Choice will determine how the game is played with friends in single player, PvP or co-op multiplayer. Squads of 4v4 players vie to complete multiple open-ended objectives, valuable items and enhancements that can change the tide of a battle, and the inevitable chaos means no firefight ends the exact same way.

With a passion for creating games that deliver immersive experiences, DEFECT serves as the inaugural title for emptyvessel. The game is being built using Unreal Engine 5, and utilizes the latest technology alongside the team’s vision for delivering unique and exciting gameplay experiences.

DEFECT will be available for PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG. A release date has yet to be announced.

item.title: Open-world survival crafting game Unhinged announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Playtest sign-ups now available.

Unifiq Games has announced Unhinged, an open-world survival craft game where you are trapped in a bizarre corporate experiment. It will be available for PC via Steam. Private playtest sign-ups are available now.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Unhinged is an open-world survival craft game where you find yourself trapped in a bizarre corporate experiment. Explore a brutal open world, build modular machines and survive mind-bending trials to uncover the terrifying truth that brought you here.

Explore

Explore a retro-futuristic island controlled by a high-tech corporate giant. Scavenge the island for resources and craft tools that help you survive.

Build

Construct modular machines, build bases, harvest electricity, automate processes, and expand your footprints on the island.

Survive

Maintain a balanced diet, forge your path through dangerous biomes, overcome the corporate trials, confront unsettling entities, and fight to maintain your sanity… or risk becoming UNHINGED.

Key Features

  • Sanity System – More than hunger or thirst, your mind is your foremost need. Manage your brain chemical imbalances in one of the most complex sanity systems ever seen in survival games.
  • Systemic Crafting – Experiment freely with ingredients to cook food, brew tea and synthesise drugs. From lethal failures to superhuman breakthroughs, every craft expands your mastery.
  • Contraption Building – Build machines, vehicles, and inventions from modular blocks. Your creativity determines your survival.
  • Trials – Scattered across the island, these corporate games test your resourcefulness. Conquer them using every tool at your disposal.
  • Automation – Set up bases connected with pipes and conveyors to automate tasks, leaving you free to focus on exploration and survival.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer

item.title: Edge of Memories ‘Story’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Introducing the universe, characters, and themes.

Publisher Nacon and developer Midgar Studio have released the official story trailer for action RPG Edge of Memories.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nacon:

About

The Corrosion, a plague of unparalleled proportions, has already ravaged the Astryan continent. On the other side of the world, the continent of Avaris and its nomadic peoples—so far spared from the horrors spawned by this abomination—now stand on the brink of extinction. Eline, an itinerant Soul Whisperer, relentlessly battles the force that turns the once-thriving fauna, flora and humans of this lush land into grotesque abominations. Following a mysterious encounter, a dark power awakens within her, one that may hold the key to ending this apocalypse: the ability to control the Corrosion within her own body.

But saving a world already doomed is no easy task. With the help of Ysoris, her unlikely mentor, and Kanta, shaman prince of a lost tribe, Eline must overcome the formidable adversaries standing in her way.

Intense Real-Time Combat

Engage in fierce battles against relentless enemies alongside your allies, and unleash your devastating powers to wipe them out!

  • String together spectacular combos by alternating between rapid strikes and devastating techniques to dominate your opponents.
  • Your allies are the key to victory. Customize your companions, and use their skills wisely to inflict more damage at crucial moments.
  • Let rage consume you and transform into a Berserker to deliver earth-shattering blows, which turn into a series of merciless executions.

A Stunning and Corrupted World

Avaris, a land of many faces, is as scarred as the rest of Heryon. From the idyllic sandy shores of the port city of Sarlah-Durah to the snow-capped peaks of the Kezal Mountains, every landscape bears the marks of the Corrosion’s abominations.

  • Explore the Continent of Avaris in the Grip of the Corrosion – Discover rich environments with vibrant colors, and observe the scourge ravaging these enchanting landscapes. As you progress through the story, the game transforms places you have previously travelled through and creates strange new paths to take.
  • Ride a Nekaroo – Traverse the vast lands of Avaris atop this loyal feline companion and take advantage of its agility to access unreachable areas.
  • Enjoy Stunning Visuals Inspired by Japanese Animation – Discover or rediscover the breathtaking world of Heryon through Avaris, a colorful and radiant continent brought to life with Unreal Engine 5.

An Intense Story With No Dull Moments

  • A Gripping Epic With No Fillers – Experience an original narrative where every quest matters, adding new depth to the story, the characters or their relationships.
  • Dive Into an Emotional Journey – Travel across a continent inhabited by nomadic civilizations forced to migrate to escape the Corrosion, and connect with those who have chosen to await death while celebrating life.

A Poetic Soundtrack

Whether you are exploring the vast expanses of the continent of Avaris or battling relentless Corroded foes, enjoy a dynamic and adaptive soundtrack composed by Cedric Menendez. Carried by the enchanting voice of Emi Evans, known for her work on NieR: Automata, your journey culminates with a final theme composed by Yasunori Mitsuda, famed for his work on games such as Chrono Trigger, Xenoblade Chronicles, and Sea of Stars.

Edge of Memories is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam in 2026.

Watch the trailer below.
